title: Bear Powers
body: <p><a href="http://thefucksociety.com/anim.php?id=bearhello&amp;w=400&amp;h=300" title="more like Bear WTF">Bear Hello</a>. I got the link from the dude who did the <a href="http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/166521" title="ring ring ring ring ring">Banana Phone</a> one, which isn't too bad either.  And I got the Banana Phone one from <a title="Davey" href="http://www.livejournal.com/users/daveyabe">Davey</a>'s AIM profile.  And he got it from Rocko (one of my XC bros).  Isn't the internet great?  I like the micromusic at the end of Bear Hello.</p>
